eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Ada; Boise; Valley; Canyon, ID; at 10:14 AM ON JAN 24, 2026 Effective until 12:14 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system.  The Valley County Sheriff's Office is looking for two missing persons who were last seen on January 19th in Garden Valley Idaho and are believed to be in danger. Missing persons are Dennis and Carol Amburgy 72 and 74 years old. Dennis is a white male 5 foot 2 inches tall 145 pounds with brown eyes and grey hair. Carol is a white female 5 foot 2 inches 135 pounds with brown eyes and grey hair. Authorities say that the missing persons may be driving a 2014 gold Toyota highlander with Idaho plates V 1 2 7 0.  If you have any information on the where abouts of these missing persons please contact Valley County Sheriff's office at 2 0 8 3 8 2 5 1 6 0.
